name: Knives And Gun Fights
description:
This is a survival hack and slash game. Your goal is to survive as many waves as possible (and beat your personal best c:). There are 4 different types of enemies. New types of enemies spawn every 5 waves, so after wave 15 there won't be any new NPCs showing up.  Btw I unfortunately didn't have time to implement audio or sound effects ://

Credits

Art and Programming : Me
